messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] imaginitive uses of laundry baskets, was Many Subjec...
messages.msgSnippet: Tracy, The lolly van gave me and my dh a good laugh! Never a dull moment! I found my 17 month old atop the computer munching chips when i left the room for a
messages.messageBody:
Tracy,
The lolly van gave me and my dh a good laugh! Never a dull moment! I found my
17 month old atop the computer munching chips when i left the room for a
second!LOL! This weekend the real ice cream truck started making its rounds
around here and i caught my 5 yo son just in time as he turned the corner to
cross the street at top speed, clutching his tupperware container filled with
pennies!LOL!~Spring is here!
Bridget
Homeschooling the mob in a messy house!
